com.mortardata.api.v2
Class JobRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.mortardata.api.v2.JobRequest

public class JobRequest
extends Object

Represents the set of arguments needed to request a job run from the Mortar API

Constructor Summary
JobRequest(String projectName, String scriptName, String gitRef, int clusterSize)
          Construct a JobRequest object for running a job on a new cluster
JobRequest(String projectName, String scriptName, String gitRef, String clusterId)
          Construct a JobRequest object for running a job on an existing cluster
 
Method Summary
 com.google.api.client.util.GenericData getArguments()
          Collect all job arguments into a form compatible with the Mortar API
 String getClusterId()
          cluster id of cluster for the job to run on, if job is using existing cluster
 int getClusterSize()
          size of hadoop cluster to launch (number of nodes), if launching new cluster

Constructor Detail

JobRequest

public JobRequest(String projectName,
                  String scriptName,
                  String gitRef,
                  int clusterSize)
Construct a JobRequest object for running a job on a new cluster

Parameters:
projectName - Mortar project name
scriptName - name of script to be run (without path or extension)
gitRef - version of code (git hash or branch) to use
clusterSize - size of hadoop cluster to launch (number of nodes)

JobRequest

public JobRequest(String projectName,
                  String scriptName,
                  String gitRef,
                  String clusterId)
Construct a JobRequest object for running a job on an existing cluster

Parameters:
projectName - Mortar project name
scriptName - name of script to be run (without path or extension)
gitRef - version of code (git hash or branch) to use
clusterId - id of existing cluster

Collect all job arguments into a form compatible with the Mortar API

isNotifyOnJobFinish

public boolean isNotifyOnJobFinish()
whether the user should be notified via email when the job is complete

setNotifyOnJobFinish

public void setNotifyOnJobFinish(boolean notifyOnJobFinish)
Set whether the user should be notified via email when the job is complete. Default is true.

getClusterType

public Clusters.ClusterType getClusterType()
cluster type requested for the job, if job is requesting a new cluster

setClusterType

public void setClusterType(Clusters.ClusterType clusterType)
Set cluster type if starting a new cluster. Default is PERSISTENT.

Whether the named script is a control script

setControlScript

Set whether the named script is a control script. Default is false.
